Hello and welcome to the topic: 'Competence 
versus Performance in Linguistics'. 'Competence

versus Performance': The concept of competence 
versus performance in Linguistics is established

by American Linguist, Noam Chomsky. According 
to Noam Chomsky, competence is the native

speaker's knowledge of his language, the mastery 
of the system of rules while performance is the

production of actual sentences in use in real 
life situations. 'Competence versus Performance':

So, we can say that a speaker's knowledge 
of the structure of the language is the

speaker's 'Linguistic Competence' and the way 
in which he uses it, is 'Linguistic Performance'.

While competence is a set of principles which a 
speaker masters, performance is what a speaker does.

The former, that is to say, competence is a kind 
of code, the latter, that is to say, performance is

the act of encoding or decoding. 'Competence versus 
Performance': Linguistic competence is the potential

ability of speakers based on their knowledge 
of the language. Saussure refers to this as 'langue'.

Linguistic Performance is the actual spoken 
ability of a speaker. This includes phonetic,

syntactic and other speech errors. Saussure refers to 
this as 'Parole'. The whole idea we can put into this

format. Aspects of language has the main division, 
that is to say, 'Language'. Language is further

divided into two categories. That is to say, 'Langue' 
and 'Parole' as Saussure refers to this. And, the 'Langue'

is further referred as 'Language Competence', 
and 'Parole' is further referred as 'Language

Performance', as we have just talked about. Questions: 
Explain briefly: 'competence', 'performance' 'Linguistic

competence', 'Linguistic performance'. Questions: Write 
'true' or 'false' against each statement. The concept

of competence versus performance in linguistics 
was established by American Linguist Noam Chomsky.

(True). Competence is the mastery of the system of 
rules. (True). Performance is not the production of

actual sentences in use in real life situations. 
(False). Competence is a kind of code. (True). Performance

is the act of encoding or decoding. (True). Hope 
you understand the lesson. Thank you and Goodbye.
